channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks | Long-span Bridge Research Group

item.title: Yufeng Bridge
item.description: Yufeng Bridge completed in 2005, is located in Yushan Town, Kunshan City and crosses the Yehe River. The bridge has a total length of about 330 meters and six lanes in dual direction. Yufeng Bridge is the first long-span leaning-type arch bridge without thrust in China, primarily designed by the Long-span Bridge Research Group of Tongji University. The main bridge of Yufeng Bridge adopts a system of leaning-type arch bridges without thrust and arch beam hinged connection system. The main span is 110 meters, and the widest part of the bridge deck is 60.9 meters with a height of 27 meters.
